pr_title: DHFPROD-5078: Display default properties for entity search results

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-5078: Adding search transform for returning entity properties

DHFPROD-5078: EntitySearch Transform Modules

DHFPROD-5078: reference entity model changes

DHFPROD-5078: Adding tests

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to select more than one entity type? If not, can we change this to a string instead of a List? We don't want the code to imply that something is possible when it's not.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: @rjrudin When AllEntities are selected, there can be more than 1 entityTypeId
replies.author: rahulvudutala
